creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Natalya showing her potbelly stove inside her appartment n Lyman, Donetsk region. The woman feels lucky, her house is in the more-or-less good condition, so she and her 5 cats can continue living here. The city was occupied by Russians and liberated by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in October 2022. The humanitarian situation remains difficult, as remaining residents have no access to gas and water, and limited access to electricity. The city was severely damaged during fighting, majority of buildings were destroyed. These days, Russian army continue shelling Lyman, killing civillians and destroing more houses almost daily.
